OOC: Just wondering why I've not seen any 
Beachcomber/Cliffjumper/Redhot/Klant/Firedrill/Torca posts. I thought 
I'd post something anyway.

****************************
> 
> ::REDHOT::
> 
>     The seeker simply stood back and watched the conversations 
around 
> him. He was humored by the bunch. He was glad to have found a 
rag-tag 
> bunch of hooligans he could bunk with until he recovered. He had 
> travelled alone for ar too long and he was glad that he found
> comrads. 
> He was almost glad for his lost battle. He ran his fingers over his 
> cockpit as he thought and quickly drew them away when agony shot 
> through him.
>     "Damn...I love... my cockpit." he said, strain and frustration 
in 
> his voice. He paused and joined Beachcomber at his side. He watched 
> the blue Autobot survey his surroundings. "If I may add..." he said 
> carefully, "try to find a spot..were...I can...fly...You can ..use 
me 
> as an aerial...scout."
>     Redhot's expression became dark. Not quite evil but certainly 
> betraying his Decepticon roots.


::Redhot::

    Redhot found a rocky rise he could sit on and carefully lowered 
himself on it. His wings still ached. He yelped quietly when he bumped 
one of them. Satisfied that the pain wasn't going to kill him, he 
activated his colour scanners in his eyes. At the edges of his 
eyesight flickering bars metered the amount of blues, reds, yellows 
and related mixes. Superficially they were useless, but they had 
proven useful more then once in conflict. He had taught himself to use 
the colour changes to detect threats. He smiled at the thought. He 
focused in on Beachcomber's arm and comaperd it to the sky's richest 
blue.
    "There's more red in his arm" he muttered absentmindedly. "Wonder 
how much yellow he'd need to blend in."

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
